name: Red Sumo Wrestling Theme / YouTube
description:
Red Sumo Wrestling Theme / YouTube
v1..0
additional_info: Sumo (相撲 sumō?) or sumo wrestling is a competitive full-contact wrestling sport where a rikishi (wrestler) attempts to force another wrestler out of a circular ring (dohyō) or into touching the ground with anything other than the soles of his feet. The characters 相撲 literally mean "striking one another".
